entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
